messages.message: Is there a difference in ACL permissions between local and dogfood environments? Locally, `context.launcher.site_perms.can_manage_marketplace_apps` resolves to `true` (unexpected) but on dogfood, it resolves to `false` (as expected).
I tried logging in/out for my account `hoangpaul`
@Paul H try using an incognito window
Also an issue for incognito window too. `can_manage_marketplace_apps` resolves to `true` locally, and `false` on dogfood =(
@Heymian - do dogfood and local share the same permission settings?
Dogfood and local should be exactly the same (same database). Can you try clearing your Redis cache locally?
All good! Kerry helped me debug. I had to close all my Chrome windows (including non-incognito windows)
Everything is sane in this world :relieved:
we resolved this - so you have to use an incognito window _and_ close all other existing incognito window. itâ€™s not very intuitive to do though :confused: just have to remember it next time
